## Instructions for running the Data-flo workflow and updating the Microreact dashboard with real data  

This guide provides an overview of how to update your Data-flo workflow and Microreact dashboard with real data.

| Instructions                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                | Image example                                                                                                                                                                                                  |

| **Gather the input files:**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 | Files you will need:                                                                                                                                                                                           |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             |                                                                                                                                                                                                                |
| The only needed file is the csv you typically export from CLIMS.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            | 1.  CLIMS csv output                                                                                                                                                                                           |
